thread.title: Boy, 10, accidentally shot, killed during Utah hunting trip

title: Boy, 10, accidentally shot, killed during Utah hunting trip
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Authorities say a 10-year-old boy was accidentally shot and killed during a hunting trip in northern Utah. … Click to Continue »...
